overview:
Alison Sigmon is the VP, Product and Content at Double Dare Studios (Tokii.com).

Alison creates game designs, quizzes, and tools that support the emotional and physical intimacy needs of couples, Tokii’s target market. She is responsible for conducting product content needs analysis and for overseeing a team that supports content collection & management. She regularly conducts user experience (UE) testing & provide UE support to designs.

Additionally, Alison interview stakeholders to determine product requirements. Later, she presents these product designs for iteration reviews, creates product narratives, storyboards, wire frames for technical development and creative design.

Not least, she regularly contributes branded website copy. She is an avid runner.
